tool_description: API about current F1 Drivers, points, and positions.
title: F1 Drivers 2021

api_list.name: Get Individual Info About Each F1 Driver
api_list.description: Gets Info about each specific F1 Driver
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-2021.p.rapidapi.com/drivers/{driversid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-2021.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All F1 Drivers Info
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about the current F1 Drivers 2021
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-drivers-2021.p.rapidapi.com/drivers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-drivers-2021.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
